content.p: We offer lots of support whether you intend to develop your career within or outside of academia. Having the space and time to talk with an adviser gives you the opportunity to ask the questions that matter to you. Read our blog: A very warm Careers welcome to our postgraduate researchers You can talk to an adviser about any aspect of your career plans including: You can choose to attend an appointment by phone, in person or online via MS Teams. Appointments are available up to two weeks in advance. If there are no appointments available and you have an application or interview deadline, or you are a part-time postgraduate researcher, please email us to discuss arranging a specific appointment time. Book an appointment on MyCareer Read our guide about how to join your appointment via Microsoft Teams or phone. Business School PhDs - email your Postgraduate Careers Team One of the best ways to boost your confidence during job hunting is to seek guidance from a professional. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
